SZNS

seasons change everything

SZNS
Seasons change, and people change. Take a journey with SZNS, a solo musician from Denver, Colorado. With inspirations of soul, R&B, and rap, SZNS is like no other. With humble beginnings in EDM and house music, SZNS has broken free from the industry norm. As the vocalist, performer, and producer, SZNS does it all. The Debut SZNS album, Overflow, is set to be released in late 2019. Explore his thoughts, merchandise, and tracklist below.

blog

explore my thoughts

View SZNS' blog
Back to Home About

04 September 2018
I could not plan for this. I could not even conceive this ever being a reality. We have just hit 100 downloads on my last track, ‘Lost Pins’. I am beyond speechless at this moment, and I’d like to thank each and every one of you for donating both your time and money to take a chance on me. You surely will not be disappointed.

10 October 2018
As time goes by, I’ve had time to think about the true meaning of life. That is, doing what you love. I’ve been granted the gift to pursue something that I am extremely passionate about. Music production. Ever since I was just a little boy, I’ve dreamed of this moment. The money doesn’t matter, the fame doesn’t matter, it’s about creating art. With your support, I truly feel like this is becoming more reality than fantasy. Thank you so much for the constant support. I have a new track coming soon, be on the lookout for it.

25 December 2018
I’d like to wish all of my fans a merry Christmas. It has been a grueling year, but that is the price you pay to pursue your dreams. I’m having a flash Christmas sale on my merchandise to express my gratitude for each and every one of you. Thank you so much, you make my dreams.

10 January 2019
You awaken in a small, completely white room. In the room is a bed, a small toilet, and a small shower. Directly across from you is a giant LCD screen. The screen comes to life, and you are greeted with a friendly message: “WELCOME TO THE MACHINE”. Coming soon.
